text: Celebrities are sending love and prayers to Florida as Hurricane Irma bears down on the state, as well as encouraging donations to relief efforts. See tweets from stars below. After devastating the Caribbean, Hurricane Irma is making its way through the Florida Keys, and is currently expected to move up the peninsula ’ s west coast. Officials have spent the last few days ordering evacuations and warning of the grave danger the massive storm poses to anyone who chooses to ride it out. With extensive damage expected, and a fear of causalities, a number of celebs have taken to Twitter to comment on the situation. Among those extending well - wishes is Kerry Washington, who tweeted, “ Sending massive love and prayers to Florida. # Irma. ” Maria Menounos wrote, “ Pls pray
